parsed.internal_thinking: I have placed my first settlement on Node 20, which provides access to Wood 11, Brick 6, and Sheep 8 (12 total pips). This is a strong starting position for expansion and early road building. My goal with the first road is to move toward the most productive adjacent nodes. Node 10 is the most attractive neighbor, as it is adjacent to Wood 12, Brick 6, and Sheep 8 (11 pips). While I cannot build a settlement directly on Node 10 due to the distance rule, moving toward it allows me to eventually reach Node 11 (Wood 12, Brick 6, Sheep 5) or Node 9 (3:1 Port). Direction 10 offers the highest yield potential for future expansion compared to directions 19 or 21. My long-term plan remains to secure Wheat and Ore with my second settlement to ensure a balanced economy for the mid-game. [Response was too brief]
parsed.note_to_self: Placed first settlement at Node 20 and road towards Node 10. Planning to place the second settlement on an Ore/Wheat heavy spot like Node 42 or 43 to balance the resource income. Need to watch if AI_2 or AI_3 take those spots first.
parsed.say_outloud: I've placed my first settlement on a solid production spot (W11, B6, S8) and I'm building my road towards the 12-Wood to maximize my early building potential. Looking forward to seeing where everyone else lands!
